title: Mortgage Manager Playbook
description:
Looking for management solutions for your mortgage business? Want to excel in your role and take your team to the next level? You’ve come to the right place! Now you can access the minds of industry leaders to help solve pain points in your sales organization. Boost your business, manage expenses, grow your team, and retain your people with expert guidance.
 
Welcome to the Mortgage Manager Playbook. Find interviews with top sales leaders/experts and learn practical tips for improving sales results. This podcast is for mortgage sales managers in banks, credit unions and IMBs—specifically sales executives with P&L responsibilities. Challenge yourself to increase production and profitability with guidance from leaders in the field. Learn how they handle these issues so you can emulate their success in your business processes.
 
Subject matter experts give listeners quality information they can use to take their mortgage business to the next level. Hear 20-minute interviews about how to tackle the toughest challenges facing managers today. Find out the best practices for increasing revenue and productivity. Discover future trends in financial services. Grow your business and get more from your sales personnel. Understand the causes of management issues and implement solutions from experienced professionals and executives who’ve been through it all.
 
The Mortgage Manager Playbook offers an avenue for industry professionals to deliver their message and create an impression. This is an opportunity for both guests and listeners to build a database of contacts, create a network that benefits these partnerships, and promote connections in the growing space of mortgage lending.
 
Pat Sherlock hosts this podcast series, offering years of experience as a financial executive and consultant. She is the President and chief sales trainer at QFS Sales Solutions, one of the mortgage industry’s top research-backed sales consulting firms. A sought-after sales trainer and speaker at mortgage banking conferences, Pat is known as a straight-shooter who delivers on improving performance for sales organizations. The author of the MBA best-seller, “Reaching the Top of Your Game: Best Practices of Top Mortgage Originators,” she frequently contributes to mortgage trade publications and conducts popular webinars for MBA Education.
 
Known as the “Terry Gross of Mortgage Lending,” Pat partners with esteemed guests who leave out unnecessary fluff. With genuine interest and curiosity, she asks deep questions. This isn't a run-of-the-mill mortgage banking podcast. Get to know professional names, build relationships, and establish a place in the industry.
 
Jumpstart your momentum towards managerial success with helpful advice from the authorities in your field. The Mortgage Manager Playbook equips listeners with a curated database of everything needed for success in sales and management results in mortgage lending. Learn valuable training methods and strategies to help you and your team go above and beyond.
 
If your sales team needs training on hiring and lead generation, Pat is here to lend a helping hand. Get your weekly dose of management solutions for your business right here. Don’t forget to subscribe to the show, so you don’t miss an episode. Visit https://mortgagemanagerplaybook.com/ for more information.

title: Socially Aware
description:
I'm Ethan Wasiejko (he/him/his), the owner of Aware Social Media Management. You can learn more about that right here: https://linktr.ee/awaresocialmedia

I focus on creating effective branding and messaging for people and communities who are often left out of mainstream marketing. Part of that mission involves having a keen understanding of social awareness...and in my case, that meaning is twofold.

Why is it so important to properly and effectively represent LGBTQ+ people and all people who might be considered "other" in society? Because being represented by someone who looks and IS like you—someone who shares your experiences—makes a difference. It makes you feel seen, heard, and understood for who you are as an individual…not just as a member of a group. When we feel seen, our self-esteem rises; we feel empowered; we have more confidence in ourselves and our abilities. And that confidence translates into success: career advancement, higher paychecks (if you're working), better relationships with friends and family members…even better health outcomes!

Let me be clear, however, that I know I do not speak for everyone. I may be bisexual, but I am still an able-bodied, cisgender, white male. This platform is intended to create a space for people from many diverse communities to come together and share their stories, businesses, and to discuss topics relating to social media and representation. All respectful inquiries and thoughts are welcome!

title: Debt Talk
description:
Talking about debt is more important than ever before, especially in times of the cost of living crisis. 

I am sure you have received a letter in the post asking you to get a credit card; or you have seen adverts on the TV or Google about different types of loans offered to you - subject to credit check. You only hear about debt when you are personally struggling financially.  

There are also regulatory changes or changes in the types of debts the sector deals with in recent times compared to just consumer credit debts. A debtor who seeks advice may also have other issues to resolve: domestic abuse, gambling, and benefit problems to just name a few.

The series of Debt Talk podcasts are here to explore the views of a diverse range of communities  - from debt collections, enforcement agents, and alternative lenders to debt advice charities-  and understand the support need of debtors in such a challenging time.

Ripon Ray has been working in the debt advice sector for over 12 years.  He is also a frequent debt expert on the BBC. More on Ripon Ray here: www.yourdoctordebt.com

La tradicional experiencia de visitar exclusivamente la tienda ha quedado en el pasado para dar lugar a una experiencia de compra en la que las barreras entre lo digital y lo físico han desaparecido. Este salto hacia la Smart Store ha sido posible gracias a las nuevas tecnologías, que han permitido crear experiencias omnicanales únicas, innovadoras y personalizadas.

title: New Day, New Dollar! eAudiobook
description:
People and Value which I call “the heart” of the business is pivoted by engagement. Setting your digital footprint harbor elements that expand your reach, credibility and build an online community around your business. The power of engagement in the position of providing value-your unique solutions, products, and guidance to the people is encompassed with vital keys;

(1) Social Media

Social networking sites help you establish yourself as a thoughtful, sophisticated, and exceptional leader in your niche or industry, and most importantly, build a strong relationship with your clients.

(2) Website

This is the informational online home that helps you showcase products and services and tell more of your story. Moreso, this is your jack of all trades associate who enlightens your distinctive creativity, the art of selling, and networking.

(3) Email

The most effective way of getting leads and communicating with your clientele. Branding your email gives a better taste and inspires customer confidence leading to huge traffic for your business.

Even without a lot of technical experience, you can take your small business online by taking a strategic approach to building a web presence. Go ahead and grab my guide for step-by-step instructions to take your small business online.

The Smartest Podcast is a must-listen for anyone who wants to be successful in business. Every episode is packed with useful information and inspiring stories. I highly recommend it to anyone who is serious about achieving their goals.

title: Marketing online: La gran burbuja del siglo XXI
description:
Nos maravillamos ante este descubrimiento del siglo XXI y todos nos volvimos locos poniendo anuncios en las redes sociales y en los buscadores de internet.
Todo parecía fácil, rápido y barato. 
Y nos lo creímos.
Entonces todo el mundo empezó a hablar de marketing online y muchos sin pasar por el offline.
¿Te imaginas que una mañana te despiertas y te das cuenta de que todo lo que sabes sobre marketing online es mentira?
Descubrirías con asombro que todo en lo que has trabajado durante tantos años y todo lo que has estudiado, se sostiene sobre pilares que no son ciertos o son incompletos. 
Autor: Javier Echaleku lanza este podcast con motivo de su 30 aniversario profesional en el mundo de las empresas, del marketing y de la publicidad.

Welcome to the "The Western New York Small Business Spotlight Podcast.”  Join us as we sit down with small business owners in Western New York to have relaxed and informative conversations about their journey to entrepreneurship. 
In each episode, we'll chat with different business owners about their unique paths to starting and running their own businesses. We'll delve into the challenges and lessons they've learned along the way, as well as their vision for the future of their company. Whether you're a small business owner or just interested in the world of entrepreneurship, this podcast will provide insight, inspiration, and a healthy dose of relaxation. Tune in and join us on the "Small Business Insights" journey!
Your hosts, Kelly and Matt Lewis, have first-hand experience running a successful small business in the region for 15 years.  They understand the effort and sacrifices that go into making a business thrive, and their goal is to highlight small businesses around the area and give listeners a sneak peek behind the leaders.

Our goal is to empower listeners with the tools and strategies they need to take their lives and careers to the next level and function at their best.

 Each episode, we delve into topics such as personal development, mindset, and self-improvement, as well as discussing business strategy and entrepreneurship. 
We also incorporate faith principles and values into our discussions to help listeners live and work with purpose. Whether you're an industry leader or just starting out on your journey, you'll find valuable insights and inspiration from our diverse lineup of guests. 

Join us on this journey to inspire, motivate, and activate listeners to be the best versions of themselves and make a positive impact in the world.💪

title: The Mary Morgan Show
description:
Welcome to The Mary Morgan Show, your online business and social media mentor. She’s learned a lot building her business from $100 to her name in 2018 to $80k, $100k, $130k cash months over and over again.  She started her business by getting on over 165 sales calls before closing a single client. Doing all the old marketing tactics she was taught in the corporate world.

“When your work can only be experienced to be understood, how do you even sell that?” Was a revolutionary thought that changed her life completely. She created a new wave of marketing with a focus on experiential & identity marketing.

She works with entrepreneurs around the globe on things like:
* Femme communication
* Magnetic selling 
* Experiential marketing
* Building a world renowned brand

She now sells multi-thousand dollar packages inside of her inbox.
With no back and forth conversations.
With no sales calls.
With no sales page.

She has simplified the process to the point where a lot of the time, all it takes to close a $50k+ investment is simply, sending a link. This podcast is a behind the scenes look to it all. The branding, marketing, sales…the good, the bad, the ugly, and everything in between for one of the fastest growing industries.

Whether you're a marketer looking to stay ahead of the curve, a data scientist interested in the latest techniques, or just someone fascinated by the potential of artificial intelligence, The Artificially Intelligent Marketing Podcast has something for you. title: Biz Talks with Kevin Pheley - Small Business Tips for Success
description:
Welcome to Biz Talks with Kevin Pheley, hosted by entrepreneur Kevin Pheley, who has built multiple multi-million dollar companies. Our podcast provides practical insights and tips to help small business owners start, grow, and scale their businesses.

As a small business owner, you know that the journey of entrepreneurship can be challenging, but our podcast is designed to provide educational and motivational content to inspire and guide you. Our podcast covers a wide range of topics related to business, including marketing, sales, finance, leadership, and more.

One of the key focuses of our podcast is marketing, and Kevin's expertise in social media paid ads is a valuable asset for small business owners looking to create effective marketing campaigns. Additionally, his experience in hiring and training large teams provides valuable insights into building and managing a successful team.

We also feature interviews with successful entrepreneurs who share their experiences, challenges, and lessons learned. With our guests' practical insights and tips, you'll have the tools to apply to your own business.

Our podcast is designed to reach a wide audience of small business owners and entrepreneurs looking for valuable insights and guidance. By sharing motivational and educational content, we hope to help small business owners overcome challenges, achieve success, and grow their businesses.

Join us for Biz Talks with Kevin Pheley and learn from Kevin's expertise and our guests' experiences.

Follow Kevin on social media:

instagram.com/kevinpheley

kevinpheley.com

Hey there CMO... Feeling lost in the ever-changing wilderness of marketing and worn out trying to convince your executive team to update the website built in 2001? Let me introduce you to your oasis in the corporate desert. Marketing Trailblazers: Fireside Chats with Mountain Conquering CMOs.

We're bringing unfiltered, no-holds-barred conversations with top CMOs from major brands. Get ready to dive into topics like getting buy-in on a risky marketing strategy, working with outside agencies, and what to say when the CEO says “Why aren’t we on TikTok?" Breathe a sigh of relief and tune in to "Marketing Trailblazers." It's the podcast that will keep you in the loop and inspire you to blaze your own path… or at least keep your job.

title: Bold Biz Diaries
description:
Welcome To Bold Biz Diaries! 🧡

Deinem Podcast zu everything IG & Podcast Marketing, Selbständigkeit & Mental Health in der Selbständigkeit.

Mein Name ist Melli, ich bin Social Media Coachin & Managerin. Seit ich mich 2017 erstmalig selbständig gemacht und lange in der Fitnessbranche als Online Coach gearbeitet habe, durfte ich über Marketing & Business so einiges lernen. Meine Learnings, Erfahrungen & Best Practices teile ich in Bold Biz Diaries mit dir. Du lernst die Dos and Don’ts im Instagram Marketing, worauf es bei deinen Posts wirklich ankommt und wie du der kleinen Stimme in deinem Kopf, der dir sagt, dass du nicht gut genug bist, endlich den Garaus machen kannst.

Glad to have you - let’s get this party started.✨

title: Builders
description:
“Builders,” with Storybook co-founders Graceanne MacDonald and Liam Moroney is a podcast that focuses on the builders within the marketing industry.

Marketing advice is easy to give, yet difficult to explain how programs are actually built.

So each episode, we’ll talk with the people who’ve actually done it. The ones who are walking the walk and talking the talk. We want to hear how they did it, why they did it, the way they did it — and the advice they’ve learned along the way, so you can build too.

Hopefully we’ll all learn a thing or two from people much smarter than us, amidst the never-ending banter that is two co-founders who spend entirely too much time together.

title: Tipsy Podcast

title: In Pursuit Of Passion
description:
In pursuit of our passion, it's easy to get lost in the hustle. We live in a time where social media is more than just a tool for our business, it's our lifeline.

In my own experience of building a service based business in the modern world, I hit a point of total confusion, overstimulation, and complete unproductivity that forced me to change the way I approached my marketing.

In the Pursuit of Passion podcast, I share the nitty-gritty behind the scenes details of what building and marketing a successful business looks like WITHOUT sacrificing time or brain cells. No more mindless scrolling on the internet. This podcast shares the strategies and the thought processes behind every move I make in online marketing for my service based business.

We discuss things like setting boundaries in business, what it looks like to achieve your highest self, how to have radical accountability, and the many strategies I use to launch simple, steady and successful marketing campaigns.

Whether you need strategies to help you move the needle forward in your online marketing, or the raw awakening that can set you free from mindless scrolling and comparison of others, I'm here to deliver the good news on how you can stay sane, happy, & motivated in Pursuit of Passion.

title: The POD Gods
description:
Are you ready to dive into a world where love, conspiracy theories and business intersect? Welcome to "The Pod Gods," a captivating podcast that delves deep into the diverse topics that pique our curiosity and ignite our passions. Join us as we unravel the mysteries, explore the trends, and unravel the hidden gems in these fascinating realms.

Hosted by a team of charismatic and knowledgeable personalities, "The Pod Gods" is the ultimate audio sanctuary for those seeking thought-provoking conversations and engaging storytelling. We believe that everyone has a story to tell and that each topic is interconnected, influencing our lives in unexpected ways.

In each episode, we invite you to join us on an immersive journey through the tapestry of human experiences. Whether we're discussing the intricacies of love and relationships or unraveling captivating conspiracy theories, we leave no stone unturned. Our goal is to entertain, enlighten, and spark conversations that challenge the status quo.

Curiosity knows no boundaries, and "The Pod Gods" embrace this philosophy wholeheartedly. In our pop culture segments, we dissect the latest trends, movies, music, and art that shape our society. We take you beyond the surface level, exploring the underlying meanings and impacts of these cultural phenomena.

But our podcast doesn't stop there. We believe that knowledge is power, and understanding the world of real estate, mortgages, and business is vital in today's ever-changing landscape. We invite experts in these fields to share their insights, tips, and strategies to help you navigate the complexities of these industries confidently.

"The Pod Gods" is not just a podcast; it's a community of open-minded individuals who are passionate about learning and sharing ideas. We encourage our listeners to participate actively, engaging in discussions, debates, and sharing their own stories and experiences.

So, whether you're a lover of captivating tales, an aficionado of conspiracy theories, a pop culture enthusiast, a real estate mogul, or a budding entrepreneur, "The Pod Gods" is your gateway to a world of knowledge, entertainment, and inspiration.

Tune in to "The Pod Gods" and let your imagination soar as we unlock the secrets, unravel the myths, and explore the vast tapestry of love, conspiracy theories, pop culture, real estate, mortgages, and business. Together, we'll challenge conventional wisdom and embark on a transformative journey of discovery.

Remember, the gods are listening. Are you ready to join the conversation?

title: Business Flow 8 podcast
description:
A Business Flow 8 Podcast a legdinamikusabban fejlődő hazai üzleti közösség, podcast műsorai a FÓRUM és a KO-OK mind a vállalkozásfejlesztésre és karrier építésre alapoznak Gundel Takács Gábor műsorvezetésével.

Mit kell tudnod a Business Flow 8 Podcastról?

Dinamikus, vállalkozói közösségünk olyan üzletembereket, cégtulajdonosokat, marketingeseket tömörít, akik folyamatos fejlődésre és üzleti inspirációra vágynak. A honlapunkon elérhető szakmai anyagok, networking eseményeink és online meetupjaink, segítik a hazai vállalkozókat a fejlődésben.

A két műsor formátumunk:

A Business Flow 8 podctast heti rendszerességgel jelentkezik. Két formátumban találkozhatsz velünk. A FÓRUM Podcast havi 3 alkalommal jelentkező podcast adás, a műsorvezető Gundel Takács Gábor. Minden adásban, a meghívott vendégekkel előre egyeztetett témát dolgozunk fel. A műsorvezető adásonként 3 meghívott vendéggel fogja ütköztetni a véleményeket. A KO-OK ezzel szemben nem a különböző vélemények ütköztetésére szolgál. Ez az adás sokkal inkább mélyinterjú jellegű, ahol Gábor havonta 1 alkalommal a meghívott vendég legnagyobb személyes és szakmai kudarcairól, fájdalmairól és az újrakezdés nehézségeiről, annak eredményeiről faggatja a mikrofon másik végén ülő vendéget.

Talán már hallottál rólunk, hiszen eddig is olyan inspiráló eseményekkel tettük le a névjegyünket, mint a 2 havonta megrendezésre kerülő Floow Day -ahol minimum 250 vállalkozó gyűlik össze minden alkalommal-, valamint a heti rendszerességgel jelentkező Flow 8 online meetup sorozat, ahol a vállalkozói élet minden területéről dolgozzuk fel az üzletembereket foglalkoztató legfontosabb kérdéseket.

title: The Anxious Marketers
description:
In The Anxious Marketers podcast, join Mia and Hannah, two marketing professionals on a mission to destigmatize mental health at work, and maybe make you laugh. They’ll chat about marketing, mental health, and succeeding in your career while also being anxious. New episodes every other Thursday.

Does mental health talk belong at work? We think so.

Do you get the Sunday Scaries? We do.

Have you ever messed up at work and wanted to crawl into a hole? Yes. We have.

Only 1 in 5 people feel comfortable discussing mental health at work. Let's talk about it! In this show, we uncover myths and truths about working in corporate America and managing mental health at the same time.

Important Disclaimer: We are not therapists or licensed professionals and do not intend to offer medical advice. Should you need immediate help, please contact the National Mental Health Hotline: 866-903-3787, your therapist, or your general practitioner for legitimate advice. This podcast is for everyone, even though we are marketers and we will talk about marketing a lot.

Thanks for joining us. Follow us on IG at @theanxiousmarketers and visit anxiousmarketers.com to stay in touch.

For inquiries, anxiousmarketers@gmail.com

Disclaimer, please read: https://www.anxiousmarketers.com/disclaimer
